attributes.action: introduce a ZERO tolerance policy on crime and have more proper POLICE officers on the beat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
so we can reclaim our streets from youths / hoodies/ yobs/ gangs
we are fed up with being intimdated by mindless yobs who terrorise our streets. have a zero tolerance policy like they have in NEW YORK and show these youths that they can NOT behave in this manner. if they re_offend then have some kind of lads army where they are forced to go and learn discipline instead of soft prisons.
